title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8.43 - Executive Order No. 43: Continuation of Executive Order Number 38. [*]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8.43 - Executive Order No. 43: Continuation of Executive Order Number 38. [*]
State Regulations
WHEREAS, on January 18, 2012, I issued Executive Order

Number 38 to address limits on the use of State funds or State-authorized
payments for administrative costs and executive compensation by providers of
services to New Yorkers; and
WHEREAS, the many affected Executive State agencies have
diligently worked to develop proposed regulations to implement Executive Order

Number 38 that require an additional brief period to be finalized; NOW, THEREFORE, I, Andrew M. Cuomo, Governor of the State
of New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and
laws of the State of New York, do hereby order that the date by which the

Executive State agencies shall promulgate proposed regulations to implement the
requirements of Executive Order Number 38 is extended up to May 16, 2012. Signed: Andrew M. Cuomo

Dated: April 13, 2012

Footnotes
*
[Continues Executive Order. No. 38 (Andrew M. Cuomo), supra. ]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
